ygData.subject: Re: a new shadowknight
ygData.msgSnippet: I am curious as well. I had a 13th level troll shadowknight and ended up quiting it because I got sick of kill stealers on the Rathe (play on RK now). I had
ygData.messageBody:
I am curious as well. I had a 13th level troll shadowknight and ended up
quiting it because I got sick of kill stealers on the Rathe (play on RK
now). I had the thought that trolls made the best SK bar none because of
regenerate and the ability to bash with a two handed sword; but now am
thinking dark elf just because of I like the image. (but no bash unless
using a shield). Ah well. So all you dark elves the question is why?

----- Original Message -----
From: Matthew Lannon <mlannon@...>
To: <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 05, 1999 10:17 AM
Subject: [eq_shadowknights] a new shadowknight


> From: Matthew Lannon <mlannon@...>
>
> i am in the process of starting a new shadow knight. i would appreciate
> any suggestions about race, where to place my skill points (str, agi,
> dex, etc.) , one handed weapons vs. two handed, suggestions for leveling
> etc. i have tried several web sites, but they were all really basic eq
> stuff. all suggestions are appreciated.
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> With more than 18 million e-mails exchanged daily...
> http://www.onelist.com
> ...ONElist is THE place where the world talks!
